snippet: “Magic/Bird” traces the history of the rivalry and eventual friendship between the basketball superstars Magic Johnson and Larry Bird.
abstract: Eric Simonson play Magic/Bird, directed by Thomas Kail and starring Kevin Daniels and Tug Coker, traces the history of the rivalry and eventual friendship between the basketball superstars Magic Johnson and Larry Bird; Johnson and Bird were initially skeptical of the production, but eventually warmed to the idea.
lead_paragraph: “Magic/Bird” traces the history of the rivalry and eventual friendship between the basketball superstars Magic Johnson and Larry Bird.

headline.seo: ‘Magic/Bird,’ a Play About Magic Johnson and Larry Bird
headline.main: A Rivalry Moves Downcourt to Center Stage
